channel.title: Were do i get or how do i make a auto-restarter for my server
channel.description: i really need a auto-restarter so people can go on my server for longer i h8 having to quit and reopen compile every 10 - 20 mins because it causes people to having 2 relog in that were already on my server

item.title: Were do i get or how do i make a auto-restarter for my server
item.dc:creator: @propabad propabad
item.description:
@propabad wrote:

i mean when my server goes offline it comes back on on its own not just closing i want it 2 reopen aswell

Read full topic
item.source: Were do i get or how do i make a auto-restarter for my server

item.title: Were do i get or how do i make a auto-restarter for my server
item.dc:creator: @XharveyX XharveyX
item.description:
@XharveyX wrote:

y dont u type ::update (howmanyseconds) before you turn of server NOTE IT WILL AUTO LOG OUT SO JUST WAIT FOR THE TIME GETS TO 00:00

Read full topic
